name: listEach
syntax: listEach(String str, UDFMethod function [, String delim, boolean includeEmptyFields]);
description: Iterates over every element of a List object and can call a UDF function, passed as the second argument.

params.name: delim
params.description: A list delimiter to be used. The default value is comma (,).

params.name: includeEmptyFields
params.description: Boolean. Whether to allow empty fields. Default is false.
